title: Mobile Learning Environment-Based Science Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and understanding of laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Emphasis on field-immersive science learning activities using mobile devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze science experiment data using mobile apps and visualize the results.
Learners can apply scientific principles through collaborative problem-solving in mobile learning environments.
Learners can develop mobile device management and learning resource optimization strategies in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
